name: Mousemarine
description:
"Play as the bravest member of the mouse Resistance, saving the Mouse island one cheese piece at a time in this exciting underwater adventure game, where you avoid proximity mines and collect cheese... Did we mention cheese?" (edited)

Credits:

Elisa Ranalli aka Elys- environment art 

Agnome01 - character art

Sci-Fi Concepts - submarine and mines art, the original game concept 

Konan - level design

Atmos - gameplay and audio programming

BenKuGD - game design, writing, UI/UX programming 

Matis Merilain- game soundtrack and sound design
